overview: This is the untold story of the 2019 Mount Everest tragedy, where 11 people died trying to scale the worldâ€™s highest summit. An image that went viral showed a glimpse of what happened that day - a long, continuous line of hundreds of climbers bottlenecked on the summit ridge of Everest, all trying to take advantage of a narrow window to get to the top.
title: A Deadly Ascent
